00053 void powermeter_init(unsigned char pickup_addr, unsigned int text_update_rate, unsigned int bargraph_update_rate, unsigned int vswr_limit) {
00054         powermeter_status.curr_fwd_pwr_value = 0;
00055         powermeter_status.curr_ref_pwr_value = 0;
00056         powermeter_status.curr_vswr_value = 0;
00057         
00058         powermeter_status.pickup_addr = pickup_addr;
00059         powermeter_status.text_update_rate = text_update_rate;
00060         powermeter_status.bargraph_update_rate = bargraph_update_rate;
00061         powermeter_status.vswr_limit = vswr_limit;
00062 }
